knimeNode.name: Event Log Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node exports an event log into a file.

fullDescription.intro: This node exports an event log into a file. The following file types are supported: XES, XES.GZ, MXML, and MXML.GZ.
fullDescription.option: The file format to be used. The following formats are supported: XES, XES.GZ, MXML, and MXML.GZ.
